Tucson lowers his brow dangerously. He had had it way over his servos with =
Hydras and his lies, and now his temper was at its breaking point.  He did =
not need weapons to fight, and it's at this time where his fists ball tight=
ly together, yet, the injured arm unable to distribute the energy from the =
all wheel drive system, to that affected arm, but the arm which was not aff=
ected, is able to recieve the full benefits of that power system, as hydrau=
lics hiss and buzz. 

" As always, famous words from a lying serpent.  I've=
 got news for you, THEY'RE NOTHING BUT LIES!"

He now makes an attempt to s=
wing his good arm toward his enemy with a very tightly balled up fist.  The=
 speed and force of the swing, can be heard with a whoosh as his arm moves =
at a heightened velocity.

OOC: Good luck with everything Airly.  Hope it a=
ll goes well.
